title: So, @RiotKateyKhaos, a question about Soulstealer Vayne...
body: Because the skin is only available through luck, is it going to be like the esports skins and not 'count' for future skin creations, or not, because it's a normal skin theme and permanently available?

replies.body: This skin is only available through Hextech, meaning you will be unable to purchase it through RP. You will have to un-box it
Yes, I know. That is not what I was asking.

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=w6PucKyI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-15T01:29:37.808+0000)
>
> Yes, I know. That is not what I was asking.

I know what you were asking, but it wasn't a good question. It is Hextech Annie in it's own rite

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=w6PucKyI,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-15T01:43:49.313+0000)
>
> ...So what does that mean...?

It means that you can always un-box the skin. It will always be available, you just have to unbox it =)

It isn't available for purchase in the RP Store, but it is available through opening chests (which you get earn in game or buy in the RP Store).
